titles: An exposition with practical observations continued upon the eleventh, twelfth, & thirteenth chapters of the prophesy of Hosea being first delivered in several lectures at Michaels Cornhil, London / by Jeremiah Burroughs ; being the seventh book published by Thomas Goodwin ... [et al.]
author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.

notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Bible. --  O.T. --  Hosea --  Criticism, interpretation, etc.
